LanguageData.BattIePatch_TexturedMetalTile_BottomWarn: Don't see the options you chose? Restart your game!
LanguageData.BattIePatch_TexturedMetalTile_NewTexture: This setting will cause Metal Tiles to use the same texture as Bioferrite Plate.
This setting will cause Gold Tiles to use the same texture as Bioferrite Plate.
This setting will cause Silver Tiles to use the same texture as Bioferrite Plate.
Bioferrite Plate uses Default Tile Texture
Hate how Bioferrite Plate looks? This setting will cause it to use the same texture as the rest of the metal tiles.
